short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes Moments link from the Twitter menu and replaces with a link to cool bot generated Limericks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Never accidentally click on 'moments' in the Twitter main menu again. Instead of being subjected to butt numbingly dumb content that nobody in sound mind wants to see, be treated to some high quality bot generated Limericks.
